subject: [Mhln] Creative Suite 3 only $269
body:
He was always leaning forward, pushing something invisible ahead of him.
How could youths better learn to live than by at once trying the experiment of living?
You may live in an imperfect world but the frontiers are not closed and the doors are not all shut.
Fortune befriends the bold.
Great eagerness in the pursuit of wealth, pleasure, or honor, cannot exist without sin.
The irrationality of a thing is no argument against its existence, rather a condition of it.
Art, that great undogmatized church.
Divorce is the sacrament of adultery.
The American lives even more for his goals, for the future, than the European. Life for him is always becoming, never being.
Those that are evil have not only the good against them, but also the bad.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow.
Asking the right questions takes as much skill as giving the right answers.
The finest steel has to go through the hottest fire.
It is easier to believe than to doubt.
Barring that natural expression of villainy which we all have, the man looked honest enough.
They can because they think they can.
Minds ripen at very different ages.
Bachelors know more about women than married men if they didn't, they'd be married too.
To offer a man unsolicited advice is to presume that he doesn't know what to do or that he can't do it on his own.
